camel.sink.path.metricType.name: camel.sink.path.metricType
camel.sink.path.metricType.description: Metric type One of: [concurrent gauge] [counter] [gauge] [meter] [histogram] [timer] [simple timer] [invalid]

camel.sink.endpoint.action.name: camel.sink.endpoint.action
camel.sink.endpoint.action.description: Action to use when using the timer type

camel.sink.endpoint.counterIncrement.name: camel.sink.endpoint.counterIncrement
camel.sink.endpoint.counterIncrement.description: Increment value when using the counter type

camel.sink.endpoint.gaugeDecrement.name: camel.sink.endpoint.gaugeDecrement
camel.sink.endpoint.gaugeDecrement.description: Decrement metric value when using concurrent gauge type

camel.sink.endpoint.gaugeIncrement.name: camel.sink.endpoint.gaugeIncrement
camel.sink.endpoint.gaugeIncrement.description: Increment metric value when using the concurrent gauge type

camel.sink.endpoint.gaugeValue.name: camel.sink.endpoint.gaugeValue
camel.sink.endpoint.gaugeValue.description: Decrement metric value when using concurrent gauge type

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.mark.name: camel.sink.endpoint.mark
camel.sink.endpoint.mark.description: Mark value to set when using the meter type

camel.sink.endpoint.tags.name: camel.sink.endpoint.tags
camel.sink.endpoint.tags.description: Comma delimited list of tags associated with the metric in the format tagName=tagValue

camel.sink.endpoint.value.name: camel.sink.endpoint.value
camel.sink.endpoint.value.description: Value to set when using the histogram type

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.microprofile-metrics.laz.name: camel.component.microprofile-metrics.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.microprofile-metrics.laz.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.microprofile-metrics.bas.name: camel.component.microprofile-metrics.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.microprofile-metrics.bas.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities
